titleStmt.title: Historical examination of the authority of general councils shewing the false dealing that hath been used in the publishing of them, and the difference amongst the Papists themselves about their number.
titleStmt.author: Jenkin, Robert, 1656-1727.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Attributed to Robert Jenkin. cf. NUC pre-1956.
